comments:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a main project (1) and put several nested source directories in it.
2. Create another project (2) that contains a linked folder to a folder from
original project created on step 1.
3. Share the original project (1) to CVS (this step creates CVS utility
directories).
4. Refresh (F5) derived project (2) -> popup and message in a log file.

Eclipse complains with that messages/exceptions until all CVS utility folders
will not be created(linked?) in a derived project(2).

Contents of .log file:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Element not found: /c46/000/CA/src.config.
